identity.mission: Create a top 1% martial arts CRM that feels like a high-tech control room for a global defense academy.
principles: Fusion: Military Precision x Swiss Design
Content: Data is the weapon; display it with lethal clarity
Contrast: Deep shadows vs. Electric signals

rules: Headings (Oswald) must be uppercase for H1 and H2 to convey authority.
Use tracking-wide for all small caps labels.
Body text (Manrope) should have relaxed line-height (1.6) for readability in dense tables.

glassmorphism.sidebar: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.85); border-right: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
glassmorphism.card: backdrop-filter: blur(8px); background: rgba(31, 41, 55, 0.4); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05);

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary-dark text-white font-oswald uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm shadow-glow transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 font-oswald uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm transition-all duration-300
buttons.danger: bg-secondary/10 border border-secondary/50 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/20 font-oswald uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm

cards.base: bg-card/40 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-lg p-6 shadow-card hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: bg-background/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md text-white placeholder:text-muted-foreground

hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background with heavy overlay

action_shot.usage: About section or Login page side image

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'Oswald' and 'Manrope' fonts immediately in index.css.
2. THEME: Override tailwind.config.js colors with the specific hex codes provided in 'colors' section. Do not rely on default slate/zinc.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard. Avoid simple single-column layouts.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove rounded-xl, use rounded-md or rounded-sm for a sharper, more military feel.
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Apply the glassmorphism styles to the Sidebar and Sticky Headers.
6. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Always add hover states with text color changes.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use the provided #0B1120.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA).
